comment._content:
She took office as New York City's Commissioner of Corrections on January 1, 1914. Several Bain/LOC photos taken soon after that date show her as active in the performance of her duties:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4786749031/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4787374312/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4786741203/]

comment._content:
Bain/LOC photos circulated by the Bain News Agency soon after the announcement of her appointment by Mayor-Elect John Purroy Mitchel:
